name: crimi
body: |- wceq(cfv(cim, co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1))), c1)

comment: The imaginary part of a complex number representation. Definition 10-3.1 of [Gleason] p. 132. (Contributed by NM, 10-May-1999.)
